headline: Kathy Barnette Scrambles Pennsylvania GOP Senate Primary, Drawing Trump Ire
author: John McCormick
sentences: All three of the top Republican candidates for Senate have pledged loyalty to Mr. Trump, and some of the former presidents followers have expressed disappointment in his endorsement of Mr. Oz, including some who booed or turned their backs when the surgeon spoke at a recent Trump rally.

Limited polling suggests a tight GOP race, with Ms. Barnette, Mr. Oz and former hedge fund executive David McCormick all potentially within striking distance of a win on Tuesday, when the Pennsylvania race will be the highest-profile among primaries in five states from coast to coast.

Pennsylvanias contest offers the latest test of Mr. Trumps grip on the GOP base during a nominating season in which he has mostly scored victories in the opening weeks.
